content: lion brand pattern # 40331-c *chs-townandcountrycapelet pdf* skill level easy level 2 size medium large circumference at lower edge 50 54½ inches 127 138 5 cm length without fringe 16 20 inches 40 5 51 cm homespun® article #790 3 balls *baroque* crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm capelet is worked from neck to lower edge rosette is crocheted with smaller hook fringe is created with crochet chain around bottom edge also available on joann com pa00100 town and country capelet 1 knit version town and country capelet with crochet trim 2 similar pattern in jiffy town & country poncho #cjif-poncho 3 *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns * 1 http //www joann com/town-and-country-capelet/pa00100 html 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/town-and-country-capelet-with-crochet-trim 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/town--country-poncho-cjif-poncho
